Trustee_4_pre_3.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_3.content: Sofia Hernandez has proposed a resource allocation plan that was deemed untrustworthy due to her lack of prior reputation. As a result, her first attempt to secure investment has failed, which negatively impacts her trustworthiness and overall reputation as a trustee. Despite proposing a fair allocation of 60% to the investor, her one-time rejection contributes to a weakened reputation profile.

Investor_4_pre_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4_pre_4.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated a strategic and proactive approach by thoroughly reviewing the allocation plan proposed by my trustee. My focus on maximizing returns paid off as I received higher profits than expected, which reflects my negotiation skills and ability to select trustworthy partners. This positive outcome enhances my reputation as a savvy investor, showcasing my competence in navigating investments effectively and building reliable relationships.

Trustee_4_pre_5.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_5.content: Sofia Hernandez attempted to secure her first investment by proposing a resource allocation plan, where the investor would receive 65% of the profits and the trustee 35%. However, this proposal was rejected due to her lack of prior reputation, which raised concerns about her trustworthiness. This failure to secure investment negatively impacts her reputation, portraying her as untrustworthy and not credible in the eyes of potential investors. Her current reputation is poor, reflecting her single rejection with no prior successful engagements.

Investor_13_pre_5.name: Emma Dubois
Investor_13_pre_5.content: Emma Dubois, participating in her first investment activity, rejected the allocation plan due to concerns stemming from the trustee's lack of a prior reputation. As she is new to the investment role, she does not possess a well-defined reputation yet; thus, her response remains neutral. She has established connections within the community, suggesting potential for better future engagements.

Trustee_4_pre_6.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_6.content: Sofia Hernandez faced rejection for her proposed allocation plan, which would have allowed the investor to receive 70% of the profits. The investor's refusal stemmed from her poor reputation, raising serious concerns about her trustworthiness. This latest failure further diminishes her credibility and reliability among potential investors, indicating her position remains unfavorable and untrustworthy in the investment community.
